sentences.english: The Pingyao Ancient Cily and Yungang Grottoes are listed as The World Culture Relics.

sentences.english: The Yungang Grottoes was the first large-scale grottoes run by the state in China.
sentences.chinese: 云冈石窟就是中国第一处由国家经营的大型石窟。
